# tf.keras.backend.constant


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/constant">

Creates a constant tensor.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/constant"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.constant</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/constant"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.constant</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.constant(
    value,
    dtype=None,
    shape=None,
    name=None
)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Arguments:


* <b>`value`</b>: A constant value (or list)
* <b>`dtype`</b>: The type of the elements of the resulting tensor.
* <b>`shape`</b>: Optional dimensions of resulting tensor.
* <b>`name`</b>: Optional name for the tensor.


#### Returns:

A Constant Tensor.
